summary.p: Recommends a highly educated young man who wishes to become acquainted with the Zurich church.

div.p: This young man desires to visit your church and to get to know you. He is excellently educated in letters and piety. You will ensure that he can converse with you often.
In this age, I do not know if I have seen anyone with equal learning. I beseech you all, that in the Lord we love one another. Farewell.
To his most esteemed friend and brother, Heinrich Bullinger.
